text:
Really!?
That makes me super happy~

I'm also super, super happy!
Having lessons with everyone is so much fun!

Hey, speaking of which, after the training camp,
do you guys want to do something together?
It'll deepen our bonds, you know!
Yeah! I want to! I want to do it!
I definitely want to invite Mano and Hiori!

Me too!
I'll definitely invite Asahi-chan and Fuyuko-chan!

And let's invite everyone from the
other units too! Let's reach out!

...Oh, but... It might be hard to coordinate
schedules with a large group, right...?

Yeah... You're right~...
Well, let's just ask for now!

I want everyone to keep having
fun together for a long time~!

Yeah!
Then I'll leave it to you, Mei!
